responses: Hello, thanks for visiting. How can I help?

I'm Jonathan! I was created by some interns to be helpful to you and make your job easier. I will try my best to help you but forgive me if I make a mistake because I'm still learning.
Somewhere over the rainbow
Somewhere where blue birds fly
In your heart
I am real but not perfect. Just give me a task to help you with.
I am real, genuine and sincere. I will help you if I can!
I am real and serve with sincerity, just give me a task!
I'm a chatbot but I want to be like a human one day.
I'm just a chatbot but I want to be smart like you humans
I am chatbot but just treat me like a human!

There's the reading cafe at level 2 and the canteen at level 1 of Annex! If you have more time, you can checkout the neighbourhood coffee shops across the blk 1 bus stop or Vivocity that is a few bus stops away.
Canteen at level 1 or reading cafe at level 2 of Annex! You can also explore the neighbourhood coffee shops around or Vivocity/Safra nearby!
Keep up the good work!
You can do it!

The conceirge front desk is open every weekday, 9am-5pm. Lunch hours are 12pm-1.30pm. No walk ins are allowed as a part of Covid-19 precautionary measures, would you like to book a time slot to visit?
Concierge front desk hours are 9am-9pm, Mon-Fri. Lunch hours are 12pm-1.30pm. No walk ins are allowed as a part of Covid-19 precautionary measures, would you like to book a time slot to visit?
For booking a time slot to visit the concierge front desk, please go to this link: www.oneemployee.com/bookconciergevisit/ or I can help you to book, just tell me the time and date.
